ygData.subject: Re: Dungeon advice
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL!  I didn t mean to imply that I m some power-leveling freakazoid.  That s the amount of exp that I feel GOOD about on those occasions when I m camping
ygData.messageBody:
LOL! I didn't mean to imply that I'm some power-leveling freakazoid. That's the
amount of exp that I feel GOOD about on those occasions when I'm camping something
for just that purpose.

I admit that I have a goal of at least one level per weekend, but playing ALL
weekend, as I do, that usually breaks down as: 15 hours to level, 10-15 hours to
mess around, 10 hours to solo one of my secondary characters (I get exhausted much
faster playing in groups).

Compared to my friends, I'm a snail. I'm now frequently grouping with the
secondary characters of my early-days party members. One guy, with only one
computer in his house, has a level 50 warrior and a level 27 Enchantress, and his
WIFE has a level 34 Cleric! And they work full time!

Kenross Cantoforjado, 34 songs, Innoruuk
Bisibiku, enchantress 11, Innoruuk
Aangie, warrior 11, Innoruuk


silky@... wrote:
>
> From: silky@...
>
> Grief - I'm happy with that over a couple weeks time - and that's being on
> a LOT too. Just not that concerned about leveling - got other things to do,
> people to see, songs to sing, drinks to down - when it happens, it happens.
>
> >I consider it good when I can net a bubble in 3-4 hours, so perhaps I'm
> not as
> >demanding as you! ;)
>
